mapper.select: select * from trade_records where referId = #{referId} and tradeType = #{tradeType}
mapper.insert: insert into trade_records( id, userId, referId, money, tradeMoney, descr, host, status, tradeype, createTime ) values( UUID(), #{userId}, #{referId}, #{money}, #{tradeMoney}, #{descr}, #{host}, #{status}, #{tradeType}, NOW() )
